comments.content: To me, it's a custom based on either [Champion Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093802/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100002) or [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093802/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100013) (No. 68 Full Featherweight to be exact). Just needs to add these median spurs. As alternative for the laziests ;) [Gothic Tuscan One](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093802/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/gothic-tuscan-one).
